title: Dr. Cimmerian's Personnel File
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en[!-- EN/RU/KO/CN/FR/PL/ES/TH/JP/DE/IT/UA/PTBR --]
|page=dr-cimmerian-s-personnel-file[!-- url of your page on the scp wiki --]

|comments= You wanna know how I got these scars?

Image credit to MireGari. Check out her links here: https://linktr.ee/miregari]]
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[module CSS]]
:root{ 
--cutColour: #fafafa;
--barColour: #590505;
}

.titledescription > :not(.titlepreview) { display: none!important; }
.titledescription > .titlepreview {
    display: block;
    font-size: 1.0em;
    text-align: start;
}

.authordescription > :not(.coauthors) { display: none!important; }
.authordescription > .coauthors {
    display: block;
    font-size: 1.0em;
    text-align: start;
}

.info-container .collapsible-block-folded a{
color: #FFF;}
.info-container .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a{
color: #FFF;}

.translation_block{
display:none;}
[[/module]]

[[include component:image-block name=cimmerianfanartfromMireGari.jpg|caption=Don't confront me with my failures. I had not forgotten them.|width=250px]]

**Name:** Jeremiah Cimmerian

**Security Clearance:** 4

**Current Assignment:** Ethics Committee Liaison

**Position:** Member of the Ethics Committee

**Former Postings:** [http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-88 Site-88], Site-19.

**Current Location:** Site-17.

**Personal Workspace:** [https://www.youtube.com/c/DrCimmerian Dr. Cimmerian's Office] on Floor 3, Section C, of Site-17.
